Literature.Title: The peculiar N- and (-termini of trichogin GA IV are needed for membrane interaction and human cell death induction at doses lacking antibiotic activity.
Literature.Author: Tavano R, Malachin G, De Zotti M, Peggion C, Biondi B, Forrnaggio F, Papini E

Literature.Title: The rational search for selective anticancer derivatives of the peptide Trichogin GA IV: a multi-technique biophysical approach.
Literature.Author: Dalzini A, Bergamini C, Biondi B, De Zotti M, Panighel G, Fato R, Peggion C, Bortolus M, Maniero AL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=8 µM,Human erythrocytes:65% Hemolysis=16 µM,Human dermal fibroblasts:50% Cell death=2 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=3±1.7µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=4±2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=16±0µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(EC50=7µM),Human epidermoid carcinoma A431(EC50=6µM),Human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60(EC50=10µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(EC50=7µM),Human  glioblastoma T67(EC50=4µM)
